data.title: Daily Newspapers
data.meta_description: Here you can find daily press and periodicals which are published in Israel and now are available online from within the National Library building
data.text:
Daily Press at the National Library of Israel

Yesterday's newspaper is always the hardest one to find. We have all seen this happen: we need an article which has been published not long ago, and we discover that no one has a copy of the paper. The National Library receives and preserves all the daily newspapers published in Israel. We invite you to read yesterday's newspaper using our new Press Website. A huge variety of scanned newspapers is accessible to the public.
